texts.welcome_message_description: A few taps on your phone, and a world of culinary delights arrives. With a diverse array of cuisines just a click away, you can savor global flavors from the comfort of home.
texts.forgot_password_info: Don't worry! It occurs. Please enter the phone number linked with your account.
texts.accept_terms: Accept Terms and Conditions to continue
texts.enter_mobile: Please enter your phone number to verify
texts.enter_otp:
Please enter OTP Code sent to 
 mobile
texts.otp_verified_message: The OTP was successfully verified Welcome to Diet Done
texts.let_us_know_how_you_found_us: Let us know how you found about us
texts.subscription_success_info: Your subscription plan has been successfully purchased, enjoy a great diet. Thank you for choosing Diet Done
texts.password_changed_message: Your password has been changed successfully.
texts.confirm_logout_message: Are you sure you want to logout?
texts.confirm_appointment_message: You can request a consultation by pressing yes. Our representative will contact you soon.
texts.diet_mission: We believe that achieving a balanced and healthy lifestyle shouldn’t be a one-size-fits-all approach. Our mission is to empower individuals like you to make informed choices about their health through personalized guidance, support, and a community-driven approach
texts.diet_done_description: At DietDone, we're committed to helping you achieve your health and wellness goals in a way that's tailored to your lifestyle. Our mobile application is designed to make your journey towards a healthier you both effortless and enjoyable
texts.terms:
Conditions for canceling a subscription to Diet Done
◦ If the customer decides to cancel the subscription on the first day or 48 hours before the end of the first week, the amount of a week’s subscription will be deducted and completed.
◦ If the customer decides to cancel the subscription 48 hours before the end of the second week, the two-week subscription amount will be deducted and supplemented.
◦ If the customer decides to cancel the subscription 24 hours or more before the end of the second week, the customer cannot refund any amount and can roll over the subscription for 3 months.
Note: The value of the one or two-week subscription is not calculated by dividing the amount by 4 or 2, but it has other criteria.
The service of stopping and activating the subscription
◦ To stop certain days during subscription, it must be 48 hours or more in advance through the application
◦ To activate any suspended day, it must be 48 hours or more ago through the application
